（ヤムライハ・通信）えっ!?
アラジン君が　さらわれたの？
google_translated:
Eh!?
Is Aladdin to be exposed?

en_text: We found it in Aladdin's luggage.
jp_text:
（白龍）アラジン殿の荷物の中に
ありました。
google_translated:
In the luggage of Aladdin
was.

en_text: It's the Eye of the Rukh, a Magic Tool that allows you\Nto communicate with someone from a distant location.
jp_text:
離れた場所で話ができる
魔法道具です。
google_translated:
I can talk in a remote place
It is a magic tool.

en_text: Somehow I managed to operate it myself.
jp_text: なんとか　俺にも使えました。

en_text: Yes.
jp_text:
（シンドバッド・通信）アリババ君か？
はい。

en_text: As far as Sindria is concerned, we can't allow our\Ntrade route with Actia to be menaced in such a way.
jp_text:
シンドリアとしても
アクティアとの交易路を→
google_translated:
As a syndria
Trials with Actia →

en_text: And I'm also worried about Aladdin.
jp_text:
アラジン君も心配だ。
応援を出そうか？
google_translated:
Aladdin is also worried.
Shall we support?

en_text: No, I think we'll try to handle it somehow on our own.
jp_text:
いえ　俺たちだけで
なんとか　やってみます。
google_translated:
No, we alone
Somehow he will try.

en_text: Depending on how it's utilized,\Na Magic Tool can become a considerable threat.
jp_text:
魔法道具は　使い方によっては
大きな脅威になるからな。
google_translated:
Magic tools are used by how to use
It will be a big threat.

en_text: Do your best, now.
jp_text: （シャルルカン）とう！　しっかりやれよ。

en_text: Good luck!
jp_text:
（ヤムライハ）頑張ってね。
はい！

en_text: Hey, Hakuryu.
jp_text: （白龍）そうですね。

en_text: What is it?
jp_text:
おい　白龍。
ん？　なんですか？
google_translated:
Heavenly Dragon.
Yeah? what is it?

en_text: You seem to have really\Nmastered how to use Zagan, huh?
jp_text: 使いこなしてるようじゃねぇか。
google_translated: You're not going to use it?

en_text: Uh... thank you very much.
jp_text: ありがとうございます。

en_text: So anyway... You know, that other thing...\NDon't tell me... that you...
jp_text: そこで…　なっ？　あれだよ…→

en_text: Well, now... What do you think?
jp_text:
へへっ。
えっ　なんだよ？　できんの？
google_translated:
.
Eh, is it?Can you do it?

en_text: I can see an island in front of us!
jp_text: （船員）前方に　島が見えます！
google_translated: You can see the island in front!

en_text: Do you think it's beyond that little island?
jp_text: あの小島に続いているのかしら？

en_text: All right... let's go!
jp_text:
≪タッ　タッ　タッ…（足音）
≪（子供）大変だ！

en_text: The ship is... the ship is...
jp_text:
（オルバ　アラジン）ん？
船に…　船に！

en_text: What the hell is this?
jp_text: な…　なんだ？　こりゃ。

en_text: Enemy attack! From the south!
jp_text: ≪（子供）敵襲～！　南から→

en_text: A ship's heading straight toward us!
jp_text:
≫船が
まっすぐに突っ込んでくるよ！

en_text: Wh-What the...?
jp_text: な…　何っ!?

en_text: They're wasting their time!\NThis island is surrounded by cliffs.
jp_text:
（オルバ）無駄だ。
ここは　絶壁に囲まれた島だ。→
google_translated:
Waste.
This is an island surrounded by the cliff.→

en_text: All right... what do you say we go on a rampage?
jp_text: さあ　大暴れといくか。
google_translated: Saya Do you want to go wild?

en_text: In order to rescue me after I was captured by the pirates,
jp_text:
海賊に捕らわれてしまった
僕を助けるために→
google_translated:
I was caught by the pirate
To help me →

en_text: Alibaba and the others have stormed the pirates' island.
jp_text:
海賊の島に　乗り込んでくる
アリババくんたち。
google_translated:
Get in the pirate island
Alibaba-kun.

en_text: Since we'd all overcome so many perilous situations till now,
jp_text:
今まで　たくさんの危機を
乗り越えてきたおかげで→
google_translated:
Many crisis until now
Thanks to you overcome →

en_text: I thought that it would end without too much of a struggle, but...
jp_text:
そんなに苦戦せずに済むかと
思っていたんだけど…。
google_translated:
If you do not struggle so much
I thought ....

en_text: Aum Madaura... who in the world are you?
jp_text:
オーム・マドーラ
あなたは　一体　何者なんだい？
google_translated:
Ohm Madora
Who are you alone?

en_text: Everybody, watch out!\NDon't be fooled by her words!
jp_text: 惑わされちゃダメだ！
google_translated: It is not good to be fooled!
